qas.question: What company said it would bring 3D technology to the PS3?
Along with Wipeout HD, what game did the press view in 3D in early 2009?
What version of firmware update gave the PlayStation 3 its 3D capability?
What word describes what happens to a game when is edited to add functions not originally programmed?
What was the PS3 console able to play after the system software was updated to 3.50?
The CEO of Blitz Games announced in December 2008 it would bring what to PS4?
Firmware update 3.33 allowed PS3 titles to be played in what?
Software update 3.55 allowed the PS3 to play what?
A title with a 3D patch is Super what?
What company said it would bring 4D technology to the PS3?
Along with Wipeout HD, what game did the press view in 3D in late 2009?
What version of firmware update gave the PlayStation 3 its 4D capability?
What word describes what happens to a game when is edited to remove functions not originally programmed?
What was the PS3 console able to play after the system software was updated to 3.05?

context: In December 2008, the CTO of <a0_0><b9_0>Blitz Games<b9_0/><a0_0/> announced that it would bring <b5_0>stereoscopic 3D gaming and movie viewing<b5_0/> to Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 with its own technology. This was first demonstrated publicly on PS3 using Sony's own technology in January 2009 at the Consumer Electronics Show. Journalists were shown Wipeout HD and <a1_0><b10_0>Gran Turismo 5 Prologue<b10_0/><a1_0/> in 3D as a demonstration of how the technology might work if it is implemented in the future. Firmware update <a2_0><b11_0>3.30<b11_0/><a2_0/> officially allowed PS3 titles to be played in <b6_0>3D<b6_0/>, requiring a compatible display for use. System software update 3.50 prepared it for <a4_0><b7_0><b13_0>3D films<b13_0/><b7_0/><a4_0/>. While the game itself must be programmed to take advantage of the 3D technology, titles may be <a3_0><b12_0>patched<b12_0/><a3_0/> to add in the functionality retroactively. Titles with such patches include Wipeout HD, Pain, and <b8_0>Super Stardust HD<b8_0/>.
